spell_tooltip.description:
Siphon haste from enemies, stealing 2% haste per stack of Mind Trauma, stacking up to 9 times. Mind Spike and fully channeled Mind Flays grant 1 stack of Mind Trauma and fully channeled Void Torrents grant 3 stacks of Mind Trauma. Lasts 15 sec.

You can only gain 3 stacks of Mind Trauma from a single enemy.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.

After casting Void Eruption or Dark Ascension, send a slow-moving bolt of Shadow energy at a random location every 0.5 sec for 3 sec, dealing 93,154 Shadow damage to all targets within 8 yds, and causing them to flee in Horror for 2 sec.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Removes all Disease effects from a friendly target.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 113,369 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 48,842 Holy damage to enemies and up to 29,258 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 6 sec.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal is reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.

Throw a Divine Star forward 27 yds, healing allies in its path for 62,749 and dealing 73,226 Shadow damage to enemies. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, healing allies and damaging enemies in its path again. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Generates 6 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 950,667. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 319,625 Shadow damage plus an additional 382,055 Shadow damage over 12 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 50% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 35,407 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Dispersion heals you for an additional 25% of your maximum health over its duration and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 40 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 601,571 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 415,333 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Hurl a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at your target, dealing 83,895 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at your target.

After casting Vampiric Touch on a target, your next Vampiric Touch within 8 sec is instant cast and deals 980,619 Shadow damage immediately.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 186,811 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Vampiric Touch deals 30% additional damage and has a chance to generate 2 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases the damage of Devouring Plague by 20% and causes it to deal its damage over 12 sec, but increases its Insanity cost by 5.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1.3 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 72,380 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 14,206 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 390,315 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 207,563 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.
Void Torrent tears open an Entropic Rift that follows the enemy for 8 sec. Enemies caught in its path suffer 98,830 Shadow damage every 0.8 sec while within its reach.
Entropic Rift slows enemies by up to 70%, increased the closer they are to its center.

Entropic Rift upgrades Mind Blast into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 687,330 Shadow damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.
Vampiric Touch and Shadow Word: Pain deal 35% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 336,133 extra damage to them and granting you 5 Insanity if a shield was present.
Summoning an Entropic Rift grants you Mind Devourer.
Shadow Word: Death has a high chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Shadow damage is increased by 10%.
Void Blast generates 100% additional Insanity.
You absorb 3% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for 100% of the amount absorbed.

Each time you cast Devouring Plague, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 20%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 731,930 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 113,815 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 49,192 Holy damage to enemies and up to 28,238 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 6 sec.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
Your Mind Blast critical strikes reduce your target's movement speed by 75% for 4 sec.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 40 yards is healed for 32,135.
Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 38,354 and reflects 6% of damage absorbed.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 319,625 Shadow damage plus an additional 382,055 Shadow damage over 12 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Dispersion heals you for an additional 25% of your maximum health over its duration and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 601,571 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 412,029 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 186,342 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.

Blasts the target for 158,949 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 4 Insanity.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.

Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.

Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a 3% chance to create Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch. 

Critical strikes increase the chance to 6%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Holy Word: Sanctify blesses the ground with divine light, causing all allies who stand within to be immune to all silence and interrupt effects. Lasts for 5 sec.
An exceptional spell that heals an ally for 40% of their maximum health, ignoring healing reduction effects.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 71,209 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 114,091 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 49,338 Holy damage to enemies and up to 29,313 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.
Reduces the cooldown of Leap of Faith by 30 sec.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify Disease and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal is reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 5% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 3% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 1 Insanity.

Throw a Divine Star forward 27 yds, healing allies in its path for 63,358 and dealing 73,497 Holy damage to enemies. After reaching its destination, the Divine Star returns to you, healing allies and damaging enemies in its path again. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.4 million.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 408,321.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.
A powerful prayer that heals the target and the 4 nearest allies within 40 yards for 286,891.

When Guardian Spirit saves the target from death, it does not expire.

When Guardian Spirit expires without saving the target from death, reduce its remaining cooldown to 60 seconds.
Holy Word: Sanctify increases the healing done by Prayer of Healing by 15% for 15 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 40 yards for 110,966.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.

Heals all party or raid members within 40 yards for 1.2 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The primary target of Prayer of Healing is healed for 125% more.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 40 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.2 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 68,543 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 48,878 Holy damage to enemies and up to 29,335 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.

Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 958,647. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.
Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.4 million.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 10 yds for 408,004.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

When Guardian Spirit expires without saving the target from death, reduce its remaining cooldown to 60 seconds.
Holy Word: Sanctify increases the healing done by Prayer of Healing by 15% for 15 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 40 yards for 113,690.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Heals all party or raid members within 40 yards for 1.2 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
The primary target of Prayer of Healing is healed for 125% more.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 40 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.2 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.
The cooldowns of your Holy Words are reduced by an additional 20% when you cast the relevant spells.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.

Reset the cooldown of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.

Heals all allies within 40 yards for 116,771, and applies Renew and 2 stacks of Prayer of Mending to each of them.

Cooldown reduced by 15 sec when you cast Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.

Atonement duration increased by 10 sec.

Smite, Penance, and Void Blast have 30% reduced cast time when you have Atonement on 3 or more allies.
Casting Shadowfiend increases your damage, and the damage of all allies with your Atonement by 10% for 20 sec.
Your Power Word: Radiance is now instant cast and the healing is increased by 10%.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 266,359 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 68,401 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 49,448 Holy damage to enemies and up to 28,288 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal is reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 955,724. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 496,252, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 5.2 million, split evenly among them.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 3.0 sec.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 30% and increases its duration by 4 sec.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 8% for 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 2.8 million Holy damage to enemies or 7.1 million healing to allies over 4.8 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
